00034 #ifndef __CLOG_H
00035 #define __CLOG_H
00036 
00037 #include <string>
00038 #include <stdexcept>
00039 #include <vector>
00040 #include <inttypes.h>
00041 
00046 class clogger {
00047         public:
00049                 typedef uint32_t size_type;
00050 
00052                 enum service {
00053                         ser_unknown=0, 
00054                         ser_smtp=1, 
00055                         ser_pop3=2, 
00056                         ser_http=3, 
00057                         ser_https=4, 
00058                         ser_emtp=5 
00059                 };
00060 
00062                 enum result {
00063                         re_ok=0, 
00064                         re_read=1, 
00065                         re_data=2, 
00066                         re_pass=3, 
00067                         re_int=4, 
00068                         re_blk=5 
00069                 };
00070 
00072                 typedef struct {
00073                         std::string id; 
00074                         std::string time; 
00075                         service ser; 
00076                         std::string msg; 
00077                         std::string login; 
00078                         std::string domain; 
00079                         std::string ip; 
00080                         result res; 
00081                 } entry_type;
00082             
00087 
00088                 enum error {
00089                         err_no = 0, 
00090                         err_temp, 
00091                         err_dom_log, 
00092                         err_empty, 
00093                         err_rd, 
00094                         err_wr 
00095                 };
00097                 
00098         protected:
00099                 service ser; 
00100                 std::string dom; 
00101                 std::string ip; 
00102                 std::string log; 
00103 
00108 
00109                 std::string lr_info;
00110                 int lr_errno;
00111 
00112                 uint8_t lastret;
00113                 bool lastret_blkd; 
00114                 uint8_t lr(uint8_t, const std::string & = "");
00116 
00117         public:
00118                 clogger();
00119                 virtual ~clogger();
00120 
00125 
00126                 std::string err_info() const;
00127                 int err_sys() const;
00128 
00130                 static std::string err_str( error );
00131                 static std::string err_str( uint8_t );
00132 
00134                 std::string err_report() const;
00137 
00138                 void ip_set(const std::string &);
00139 
00141                 void service_set( service );
00142 
00144                 void domain_set( const std::string & );
00145 
00147                 void login_set( const std::string & );
00148                 
00150                 virtual uint8_t write( result r, const std::string & s ) = 0;
00151 
00156                 virtual uint8_t log_read_dom_log( std::vector<entry_type> &, 
00157                         size_type = 0, size_type = 0) = 0;
00158 
00162                 virtual uint8_t log_cnt_dom_log( size_type & ) = 0;
00163 
00167                 virtual uint8_t dom_log_read_log( std::vector<entry_type> &,
00168                         size_type = 0, size_type = 0 ) = 0;
00169 
00173                 virtual uint8_t dom_log_cnt_log( size_type & ) = 0;
00174 
00176                 static clogger * alloc();
00177 };
